migrate.description: Apply pending migrations to SurrealDB with dependency resolution

rollback.description: Rollback applied migrations from SurrealDB with dependency safety checks

status.description: Show migration status and dependency information for SurrealDB

reset.description: Reset migration tracking table and clear all migration history

lint.description: Lint SurrealDB migration files for syntax and best practices

test.description: Test SurrealDB migrations (guidance and future implementation)
